talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Terrence Terramai$
Oh, you're back!

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
I'll go there on my own so go and tell the humans in the Royal Castle about the good news.
(Rubinart smiles. Go and let Terrence Terramai know about the news)

$Terrence Terramai$
Is it really true that you've found out where Feder is in such a short period of time?!
How did you manage...?!!

$Duke Stuart$
Of course it's a lie, it's simply impossible to find him so easily! Hundreds of soldiers are still recovering from their battle wounds.

${user_nick}$
...I met Jasmine, do you remember her? She's... the one from the future who burned Tel Rosa city down and built her expedition base. (Your words stir up a commotion in the castle. Stuart looks shocked too. Of course he knows who she is, he sent his own army to get her last time)

$Duke Stuart$
Of course I know who she is. Her technology really was something that we had never seen before. I heard you defeated her, but why is she in the picture again?

${user_nick}$
She didn't die and she ended up joining Feder.
Besides,... with future technology, she succeeded in making Feder the Red Dragon...
And the Red Dragon's Nest is being built in Ayrn Island right now.

$Duke Stuart$
Nonsense!! Someone who has the technology of the future became Feder's subordinate, and Feder's a dragon now...?!?! Don't try to spoil our mood with such absurd stories! How can we possibly believe you?!

$General Douglas$
Wait a minute, Ayrn Island? Isn't that the legendary Hero Island where the hero kings are said to be resting in eternal sleep? If the legends are true, there's a high chance Feder would go there, but how do you find an island which exists only in legends?

${user_nick}$
Please show me the map for a while... Ayrn Island is... right here. It's a small island. It's pretty far from here, and I'm the only one who can enter that place.(As soon as you finish saying this, you can hear murmurs asking whether it's another solo mission)

$Terrence Terramai$
…Silence!! Please fill us in. Why do you say that you're the only one who can enter?

${user_nick}$
…(Tell them about Red Dragon's spell and how you ended up getting the Red Dragon Rubinart's help after finding his book by chance)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(That would be great, but would it be possible...)</html>
<html>(I could, if I can find them quickly enough...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Terrence Terramai$
I see... Sigh... Even if our army could enter when the spell is lifted, what's worrying is what comes before that. Are you going to fight Feder all by yourself?! Do you think that's possible? Can't you at least gather some adventurers who are like you?

$Duke Stuart$
Anyway, this is too absurd. We can't be rash in sending our army.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
{user_nick} is already in that absurd danger! Besides, I've already received dozens of reports about weird flow of mana and an increase in the number of monsters around the place {user_nick} showed us on the map. This can't be a coincidence. That island could really be Ayrn!

$Duke Stuart$
How can anyone believe that a legendary island that no one managed to find is stuck in that insignificant corner of this world!
Kayleen, are you sure you didn't purposely leak your reports so that {user_nick} answered in that way?

$Duke Stuart$
(He is reading the documents like he's busy)

$General Douglas$
(He is discussing something with Kayleen)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
(She is listening to Douglas attentively)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Wh-wh-what did you just say...?!
There's a limit to how much insult I can take. You just crossed the line!!
(Kayleen's face turns red with fury)

$General Douglas$
Please calm down! Stuart, Kayleen! Both of you need to cool down.
We can't carry on with the meeting like this.
(Douglas desperately tries to improve the hostile atmosphere)

$General Douglas$
If the number of monsters has increased, it is our duty to get rid of them to protect our people. Whether that place really is Ayrn or not, we need to deploy our troops. We can investigate on the island as the soldiers counter the monsters. What do you think?

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
The sorceresses are in. Let that duke decide whatever he wants!
If he's going to be negative on everything, he can just suck on his thumb and wait for this world to end!!
So many people are trying their best to save the world, yet the duke knows nothing but being sarcastic!!

$Duke Stuart$
…Well I'm just trying to be more careful here since we are facing such a serious situation!
Don't you think you are trusting that adventurer too blindly?! That's just an ordinary adventurer!
Such ordinary adventurers can easily be found in every corner of Saint Haven!!

$Terrence Terramai$
And do you know how much this "ordinary adventurer" has done for us? Oh Stuart.
You shouldn't judge a person by their background, but by their contributions.
The Goddess taught us to be fair, yet you keep doing the opposite even when you're a member of the Order.

$Duke Stuart$
Whatever the case, count me out.
Do whatever you please.(Stuart shuts his mouth)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Hmph. The reports and the strange movements of the monsters are as real as they can be. Whether there is a nest there or not... there is a need for us to investigate. What {user_nick} told us has enough sense, so I'll get ready for an immediate dispatch by checking on the forcefield in the area.

$Terrence Terramai$
{user_nick}, you did well. If the Red Dragon Nest is not a place where you can go right away, why don't you take a rest for a while...?

${user_nick}$
…That's very kind of you but I need to prepare myself by investigating more about the nest. Only in that way I would have higher chances of winning.

${user_nick}$
(You hear murmurs again. People are whispering to each other that... You're still brave even after a fearsome battle... and that you're trying to protect the world even when your friend's achievements have been denied... that you have an amazing willpower and that you always lead in action, that you're the true hero of Calderock and Saint Haven... So many praises that you've never heard before are streaming out of everyone's mouths that you feel a little shy...)

${user_nick}$
(Not just me but... Geraint, Argenta, Iona, Rubinart, and... Meriendel... we only wanted to protect this world with whatever way we could... Everyone longs for peace in this world, and I don't want it to be destroyed all because of a screwed mindset of one person...)

$Terrence Terramai$
Now, silence! Very well, if that is your wish. Please don't overexert yourself. If you need help, tell us anytime. I'll send a letter to the Elf Elder so {user_nick}, you can concentrate on the investigation like what you said. (Terramai seems proud of you)

${user_nick}$
All right, thank you.
(Go and look for Rubinart at Anu Arendel)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:Talk}
Oh you're here! You look more resolute than before. Good.
Anyway... I managed to find my way to Anu Arendel but I thought of something that should be discussed privately between us... Hmm, how about discussing it in the Crossroad of Hesitant Past?

${user_nick}$
Erm... Okay... (That suddenly reminded you of your last encounter with Iona, but Rubinart grabs your shoulders and looks at you right in the eyes. He's so manly here... for nothing...)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9569_qu_01.ogg}
Hey don't look so frightened. Don't look at me like I just reminded you of a trauma. We're really going there just for a talk.
It's not a farewell or whatever, it's just that there are too many people around here who can hear us. Got that?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
...You have no idea how old I am. Let's go, it's just a chat.
(Rubinart smiles. Go to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past)

$Rose${sound:npc_Roze_9569_qu_01.ogg}
...Tell me, what is the extent of my foolishness? I... I made the most selfish and stupidest mistake in this world... I'm the only one who forgave myself. Everyone else in this world curses my foolishness and even the Goddess is turning her back on me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>...Nothing will be solved even if I said sorry.</html>
<html>I am to blame, for not rescuing you...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Rose${sound:npc_Roze_9569_qu_02.ogg}
…I knew you would find out about everything.
I need to apologise to you... I'm sorry... I really am.

$Rose${sound:npc_Roze_9569_qu_03.ogg}
…The fact that you're gazing at me with such warm affection means everything is distorted. Ah... I shouldn't have listened to the sweet words of that woman. I should have been strong and humbly accepted that I'm someone who could be happy.

$Rose${sound:npc_Roze_9569_qu_04.ogg}
…Now the shadow will always remain a shadow... and lead you to the right way... But... But I'm just a person who's on the path of evil... Please don't forgive the evil me nor the good me. I know, it's something that both you and I truly wanted...(Rose's face fades away)

$Rose${sound:npc_Roze_9569_qu_05.ogg}
…Don't be fooled by sweet words…
There is no way to turn back time... But there is a way to distort this world... Please remember that they are different... Goodbye, the pitiful one who has to take all the burden on my behalf...

${user_nick}$
…Is that woman you talked about... My mother, Gaharam...?

$Rose$
…(She nods without saying anything. Her eyes look awfully sad)

${user_nick}$
…It's me who should be apologising... Only if I didn't try to stay alive, your fate wouldn't have been distorted!
If it wasn't for me, you could have remained as the Prophet!

$Rose${sound:npc_Roze_9569_qu_06.ogg}
…(She shakes her head)
…I had a choice... and I fell for temptation... I knew everything yet I pretended I did not. I shouldn't blame you. This is all but a consequence of my decision.

${user_nick}$
……..Don't act like you're not bothered! If it wasn't me, your fate wouldn't have been tangled and you wouldn't have ended up as Rozalinde! You wouldn't have lost your parents, and... and...

$Rose${sound:npc_Roze_9569_qu_07.ogg}
…(She cries quietly and steps forward to give you a gentle hug)
If that was also a part of my choice, will you hate me even more...? If that's the fate I attained by struggling and running away, will you pity me...?

$Rose${sound:npc_Roze_9569_qu_08.ogg}
…You were just swept by the distortion of fate. All I want is that you wouldn't have the same fate as me... This cruel fate that makes you lose everything whether you make a choice or not... Even if you try to protect everything, you'll lose everything... It was... It was too hard for me...

$Rose${sound:npc_Roze_9569_qu_09.ogg}
…I sincerely hope that you would have many paths for you to choose from. And... please remember... there's no way you can turn things back, but there's a way to distort things... but they are very different... Ah, please don't forgive me... What I did was what I, and the ones I loved, truly wanted...(Rose slowly disappears)

${user_nick}$
…Rose!! Wait!! No...!!

${user_nick}$
…(Rose is gone... What did she want to say...? She wanted to disappear? A cruel fate? What she went through surely was cruel fate, but could there be something more to it? Could it be that the fate of the Prophet before Gaharam distorted it was something different?)

${user_nick}$
…(Can I stand making the same choice as what was hard for her to make? But it can't be that she wants me to sit around and do nothing when the world is about to end... I must... Lead the way to a future with no destruction... That's what I'm supposed to do.)

${user_nick}$
(…Someone is around!)

${user_nick}$
Rozalinde?! How did you...?

$Rozalinde${sound:npc_Rozalinde_9569_qu_01.ogg}
How? Of course I'm following my king! I hope you weren't plotting anything to harm my glorioius king. Oh well, what can a loser like you do to Feder.

${user_nick}$
You didn't give up yet? Feder's not around this place. Why are you here...? If what Velskud said was true, you should already be...

$Rozalinde${sound:npc_Rozalinde_9569_qu_02.ogg}
Oh don't be ridiculous! What do you know about my king!! King Feder is the one who will bring our world back to the right track!! I have no time for you! I don't want another word out of your dumb mouth! I don't want a useless adventurer to ruin my day!

${user_nick}$
(…Calm down... This isn't Rose, it's Rozalinde... But….)
I'm sorry.

$Rozalinde${sound:npc_Rozalinde_9569_qu_03.ogg}
Huh?(Rozalinde's eyes widn)
Are you sick in the head? Or are you trying to ask me to take you in as my slave?

${user_nick}$
Well... You're actually a Prophet, and the reason why you became Rozalinde is… (Tell Rozalinde everything.)
And as the Shadow Prophet, I will be taking over your fate...

$Rozalinde${sound:npc_Rozalinde_9569_qu_04.ogg}
….(Rozalinde slaps her forhead in frustration)
Are you mad? Or are you really sick? An Ancient?? Nonsense! Oh well, how can you remain sane after going into the Monolith? My fate? What fate can I have other than being by King Feder's side?

$Rozalinde${sound:npc_Rozalinde_9569_qu_05.ogg}
If you're the Shadow Prophet, you must have seen the ugly future this world is heading to. So how do you find it?

$Rozalinde${sound:npc_Rozalinde_9569_qu_06.ogg}
So you don't even have the power of the Ancients and you don't see the future and you're trying saying that you're a Prophet?
Why don't you find a better story if you want to con me? (Rozalinde snorts)
I hope we don't see each other again... annoying idiot.

${user_nick}$
Rozalinde!! Wait…!!
(Rozalinde quickly disappears as if she's really irritated)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I met Prophet Rose on the way.</html>
<html>I met both Rozalinde and Prophet Rose...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Hey you're here. Did something happen to you on your way?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:No}
The Prophet? That's strange. Anyway, I'm not interested in such things. Let's talk about us.
What I wanted to talk to you about is the plan after your battle with Feder, supposing that you win him. Defeating him doesn't mean that the Monolith will close. The fact that The world is heading towards its doom doesn't change.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
No one in Lagendia has the ability to close the Monolith now. Looking for another Chaos Dragon would be like finding a needle in the desert. Even if you manage to find one, that doesn't guarantee it will be on our side or strong enough to close the door. No one knows.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm used to it now so it's okay.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
So there was only one way I could think of. But... it would be burdening you again.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Haha. (Rubinart grins again)Aren't you saying it too naturally now?
My plan is for you to go to Mistland.
Whether you meet the Goddess there or whatever, bring back something or someone who is strong enough to close the Monolith.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
That's what I was expecting. But that is the only way.
We can't send the young Ancient Dragon weakling or the Ancient Dragon who may implode anytime with two jewels, can we? For Velskud, I would advise him to just release the power, rather than trying to use the power himself...

${user_nick}$
Does that even make sense?!! How do I go to Mistland?? How do I pass through the Monolith, and even if I succeed in doing that, how do I survive in a world full of poison?! I think you're having the wrong idea here that I'm as strong as you. I'm not! Besides, we don't know what's waiting for me at the other side!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>How can you be sure that you went to Mistland?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:Talk}
All right, I'll explain one by one. If you've seen me in the past, you should know that I stayed behind in the Monolith with Meriendel with half my jewel left. After... Meriendel died... I must have went to Mistland. I wouldn't have died so easily, and things make sense only if I went to the other side. So go and find me there.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
I'm more or less certain about that. I can't tell you the reason why I'm so sure, but I just know it. Meriendel wanted to protect this world... and Meriendel was precious to me. All right, next question! You asked how you would survive. Easy. My jewel still exists in this world too.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Yes. When you defeat Feder, make sure that you get the Red Dragon's jewel in your hands. Use that power to go to Mistland. Half of my jewel wouldn't be strong enough to do you any harm since you're being protected with Iona's power. My jewel will naturally try to join the other half in Mistland... so you'll be able to find your way easily. It'll keep you safe from Mistland's poison too.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Well, if you still feel uneasy, take Geraint with you. He may be a whining kid but he's still an Ancient Dragon. At least he can slap you awake when you lose your consciousness. You know how to control him. It was scary when he suddenly turned more mature after you had a good talk with him last time. (Rubinart shivers jokingly)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Erm... Why don't you get the jewel and go there yourself?</html>
<html>Wouldn't it be better if you went there yourself?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Isn't it amazing? All you have to do is defeat Feder and there's a way for someone from Lagendia to go to Mistland.
This is a last chance and last hope at the same time.
There's no other hope for this world other than finding a way in Mistland.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Don't say such sad things so nonchalantly...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Hahaha, {user_nick}. I'm nothing but a soul and I can never become a whole person again… Besides, that jewel was broken away from my original jewel. That means Red Dragon Rubinart in that jewel is dead and I can't do anything with it. The new Rubinart created with that jewel would probably be someone completely different from me.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
I know you're feeling burdened and scared...
But I want you to know that sometimes, taking the challenge and doing something completely new could be a solution to an existing problem...
This is what I found out from thousands of years of accumulated wisdom. By the way... (Rubinart ponders a while before opening his mouth again)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:Talk}
Erm...(Rubinart thinks for a while before he continues talking)
There must be someone other than me who you can talk to. I even talked with Beyond Dragon before.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
It was really a coincidence. I happened to find a slightest tiniest fragment of the Beyond Dragon. I used all the materials I could find to turn it into a human form. Of course, he was really unstable, with no manners too! I lost him when he teleported into a different time period or whatever, but at least, he could talk! There must be another one of those beings in Mistland I guess.

${user_nick}$
So the experiment you talked about last time was using a Beyond Dragon's fragment?!?! You made something like me with Beyond Dragon's fragment?!?! Are you insane?!?!?!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Let me give you an F for that!! (Smack him)</html>
<html>Chaos Dragon became corrupted fighting that!! (Smack him)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:No}
Erm... {user_nick}? Don't look at me like you'll grab my throat... I just barely gave him a human form to find out what Mistland was like! That small fragment can't possibly become a dragon or spread poison! It was all for pure academic purposes...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>A safety device? But it's still a Beyond Dragon!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Hey hey! Ouch!! Listen to me. It'll probably die when it goes near the Monolith.
I hope you've realised by now that I'm a wise dragon. I made sure that it died when it tried to use its Beyond Dragon's powers or when it tried to be awakened by coming into contact with something corrupted... I've made sure that safety device worked. Nothing happened until now, see?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Meriendel... Phew, if I think about her...)</html>
<html>(Wouldn't you be angry if you were me?)</html>
<html>(Well, if I think about all the things he helped me with until now...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Hey trust me on this, will you? You've trusted me all this while... Why would I want to do something to you when this world is in such a mess? I just want to protect this world. No matter how corrupted I am, I certainly don't want this place to turn into Mistland. Meriendel wouldn't want that... Anyway, are you going to take my suggestion? You will, won't you? Hmm?

${user_nick}$
All right, I will. Even if I go to Mistland, I don't think people in this world will wait for this world to end without doing anything. You said this task would burden me, but I will rely on other people too. We are one in our desire to save this world.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
(Rubinart's eyes widen)Wow... It was brave of you to accept my suggestion, but you don't have to care about those good-for-nothing humans. I don't think I can be so benevolent. I didn't know you would include other people in the plan... I see... So that's why Iona...

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
(Rubinart playfully lowers his head with a flourish)
I hope you defeat Feder, who has embraced the wrong willpower and discover another possibility from the world, {user_nick}.
Also, I, the longest living dragon alive, hope the road you’ve found becomes the new fate of the world...

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9569_qu_02.ogg}
(Rubinart playfully bows exaggeratedly)
Please defeat Feder who is going the wrong way, and find another hope for this world, {user_nick}.
I hope the new way you find will become a new fate for this world... Rubinart, the oldest dragon in this world, prays for you.

$Priestess of Darkness Pretzel$
Now, the only thing left is the battle with Red Dragon Feder.
Are you ready?

${user_nick}$
(Maybe it’s because you’ve started to relax……
but the moment you try to get Red Dragon’s half jewel,
the pain you’ve been enduring so far overcomes you and your sight becomes dark.)

$Geraint$
H, hey, open your eyes, {user_nick}……!
Don’t tell me you are badly hurt!

(Geraint is about to cry)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Don’t make a fuss, you little Ancient.
{user_nick} has just passed out for a moment.
Take him to the town, let him have a good sleep in a nice bed, and he will wake up without any problem.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Ancient, as well as Chaos, we are all in debt to you.
You saved the world today, {user_nick}.
And……

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
……Goodbye, Feder.

(Rubinart turns away with a bitter look)

※ Go to Saint Haven and find Temple Knight Elizer.

${user_nick}$
(Your hair is blowing in a pleasant breeze, tickling your cheeks.
As you open your eyes, you find Elizer on the guard.
This is…… Saint Haven.)

$Temple Knight Elizer$
You are awake, {user_nick}.

$Temple Knight Elizer$
Geraint and Velskud
were fighting over what the conditions of a nice bed are and then……
left you here so that you could feel the nice breeze.

$Temple Knight Elizer$
Though it is truly nice the breeze that blows around the summit.
……So, do you feel better now?
<html>$Complete Quest$</html>

$Temple Knight Elizer$
Haha, that’s good to hear.

(Elizer is smiling)

※ You have completed Extra Chapter 4. The Red King and the Red Dragon.

journal.title: The Penitent 1
journal.contents:
Let Terrence Terramai know about the Red Dragon Nest.

Saint Haven - Saint Haven Royal Castle (Terrence Terramai)
journal.todo_msg: Quest has been added. Go to Terramai and tell him about the Red Dragon Nest.

journal.title: The Penitent 2
journal.contents:
You're praised for conscientiously carrying out your missions... Which makes you a little shy.
It's a relief that a plan has been devised to counter the Red Dragon Nest.
Go and report to Rubinart.

Anu Arendel - Rubinart
journal.destination: Report to Rubinart in Anu Arendel
journal.todo_msg: The plan has been made. Tell Rubinart about it.

journal.title: The Penitent 3
journal.contents:
Rubinart seemed relieved after hearing that a plan has been devised and asked you to go to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past to talk privately.
Go to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Rubinart)
journal.destination: To the Crossroad of Hesitant Past
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past to talk to Rubinart.

journal.title: The Penitent 4
journal.contents:
Is that Rose at the Crossroad of Hesitant Past?!
Talk to Rose.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past(Rose)
journal.destination: Talk to Rose at the Crossroad of Hesitant Past
journal.todo_msg: Rose has appeared. Talk to her.

journal.title: The Penitent 5
journal.contents:
Rose is gone… Gather your thoughts.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Where Rose was)
journal.destination: Gather your thoughts at the place where Rose was standing
journal.todo_msg: Rose disappeared...?! Gather your thoughts at the place where Rose was standing.

journal.title: The Penitent 6
journal.contents:
This time, Rozalinde has appeared!
Talk to Rozalinde.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Rozalinde)
journal.destination: Talk to Rozalinde at the Crossroad of Hesitant Past
journal.todo_msg: Rozalinde has appeared. Talk to her.

journal.title: The Penitent 7
journal.contents:
It looks like Rozalinde hasn't met Feder yet…
Rozalinde is gone. Go and meet Rubinart.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Rubinart)
journal.destination: Talk to Rubinart at the Crossroad of Hesitant Past

journal.title: The Penitent 8
journal.contents:
Rubinart started telling you an unbelievable story.
A fragment of Beyond Dragon?! Listen to his story.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Rubinart)
journal.destination: Talk to Rubinart a little more
journal.todo_msg: Rubinart told you something unbelievable. Talk to him a little more.

journal.title: To Red Dragon’s Nest
journal.contents:
There’s only one thing left to do: to defeat Feder who whas awakened as a Red Dragon.
To to Red Dragon’s Nest with the help of Priestess of Darkness Pretzel.

Anu Arendel - Priestess of Darkness Pretzel
journal.destination: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Pretzel

journal.title: The Penitent 9
journal.contents:
In order to save the world, you can neither retreat nor run away.
The only thing left is the battle with Feder, who has turned into a Red Dragon.
Defeat Red Dragon.

※ If you fail to defeat Red Dragon, you can reenter the Nest through Priestess of Darkness Pretzel at Anu Arendel.
Red Dragon Nest - Rubinart
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Rubinart after clearing the Nest.

journal.title: The Penitent 10
journal.contents:
A breeze tickles your cheeks and wakes you up.
You slowly open your eyes and find the familiar sight of Saint Haven in front of you.

Saint Haven - Temple Knight Elizer
